EmailTemplate.name: Second level alert stream
EmailTemplate.subject: Reminder Stream {!ESNStream__c.Name} started yesterday
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hello,
You are either the stream leader or the project manager for the stream {!ESNStream__c.Name} of the project {!ESNStream__c.Project__c}.
The stream {!ESNStream__c.Name} has started yesterday and the status of the stream is still inactive.
Remember to update the stream status if the stream has started or to inform the project manager if you have any issue ({!ESNStream__c.ProjectManagerEmailStream__c}).
Regards, Chatter support team
If you have any question, please contact chatter@pernod-ricard.com
